description: many boats next to each other on shore; baskets of apples being unloaded from frontmost boat; horse-drawn carriages in shore in middle ground, URQ; bridge and buildings in background
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

LRC, in the print: [H. PALLARO (?)]
portfolio: From Les Bois du Monde Illustré
provenance: [Catherine E. Burns, Oakland, CA, until 1998; sold in March for TTO, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1998-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC, in the print: [A. LEPERE]; LRC, in pencil: [A Lepere]
title: The Arrival of Apples, from "Les Bois du Monde Illustré"
